title: BONUS EPISODE: Residente On Frustration w/ Grammys, Bad Bunny, + 'This Is Not America'
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Puerto Rican rapper Residente sits down with Ebro in the Morning to discuss his new single and controversial music video 'This Is Not America'.

He also speaks about his frustration with the Grammys, relationship with Bad Bunny, moving to Los Angeles, the political landscape in Puerto Rico, and possibilities he would ever record an English album. 

LISTEN TO HOT 97's NEWEST PODCAST "TAP IN WITH TT" ON:
